meanings.definition: A person who engages in physical activity to improve health or fitness.
meanings.sent1: Many exercisers go for a run in the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: Gyms are popular places for exercisers to work out and stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The group of exercisers at the gym accidentally wore matching outfits.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated exerciser, always pushing herself to new limits.
meanings.sent5: The community center offers a variety of classes for exercisers of all levels.

meanings.definition: Devices or equipment used for physical exercise.
meanings.sent1: Home exercisers like treadmills and dumbbells can help with workouts.
meanings.sent2: Fitness stores sell a wide range of exercisers for different needs.
meanings.sent3: The exercisers in the garage were gathering dust from lack of use.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite exerciser was the resistance band for toning her muscles.
meanings.sent5: The new exerciser she bought made her home gym complete.
